publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3155.2 Tommy Sheridan: Potential Benefits to the Scottish Economy of the Planned Energy Research Institute and of the Diversification of the Offshore Oil and Gas Industry-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3155) in the name of Lewis Macdonald, insert at end "and calls for a six month committee-led appraisal of the potential benefits to Scotland's economy and citizens of a publicly-owned, democratically administered and fully integrated oil, gas, electricity and renewables energy industry."
